locations.hoursOfOperation: Mon.-Sat., 11 a.m.-7 p.m. Sun., 11 a.m.-4 p.m.

name: Mississippi Brewing Company
description: Mississippi Brewing Company LLC plans be pouring beer in late 2013. What sets us apart from the rest is that we understand the need for local “Light Drinkable Beers” as well full flavored Craft beers.

name: MobCraft Beer
description:
MOBCRAFT IS THE WORLD’S FIRST COMPLETELY CROWDSOURCED BREWERY!

MobCraft Beer is a small craft brewery making custom craft beer. We produce small batch “custom craft beers” based off of users submitted recipes and ideas which end up in our recipe vault. Each month, you can vote on a wide variety of beer styles and flavors. Cast your vote by pre-ordering the beer you want us to brew. MobCraft will produce the beer with the most orders and ship out a 4 pack of 22oz “bomber” bottles to your doorstep! Or if you're near the brewery come pick it up in our tap room location in Madison, WI!

name: Modern Times Beer
description:
Modern Times is a 30bbl production brewery and tasting room in the Point Loma neighborhood of San Diego. Modern Times is named after a beautifully crazy utopian community founded in 1850, and (almost) all of our beers are named after real utopian experiments or mythological utopias.

The brewery was founded by the guy writing this (Jacob McKean), a beer geek, former Stone Brewing Co. employee and long-time homebrewer, along with crack team of consultants consisting of illustrious graphic designers, vicious attorneys, a slightly unhinged kombucha-obsessed real estate agent, one faraway brewing prodigy, a pricey architect, a gregarious general contractor, and (a bit later in the process) three outstanding brewers. 

Today, we're distributed throughout Southern California and have a fully awesome tasting room at our brewery, along with a super rad tasting room in North Park. You should totally come check it out.

name: Monadnock Brewing Company
description: Monadnock Brewing Company is a NH based nano-brewery in the planning stage. Please stay tuned for updates. We will brew high quality German lagers as well as American ales.

name: Moo-Duck Brewery
description:
Our mission is also our slogan: Celebrating Beer Moo-Duck Style. 

Moo-Duck Style is HANDCRAFTING beer in small batches, allowing us to serve the freshest beer possible.

Moo-Duck Style is using the HIGHEST QUALITY ingredients possible.

Moo-Duck Style is respecting the traditional beer styles while embracing NON-TRADITIONAL brewing ingredients.

Moo-Duck Style is buying LOCAL ingredients whenever possible while supporting the local community through charity brews.

Moo-Duck Style is expressing our creativity throughout the brewing process to craft a beer that is INTERESTING and DELICIOUS.

Moo-Duck Style is promoting the RESPONSIBLE enjoyment of craft beer in a casual setting.

Moo-Duck Style is passionately wrapping our hands around our work to serve a beer we are PROUD of.

name: Moody Tongue Brewing Company
description: Founded in 2013 by acclaimed brewmaster Jared Rouben, Moody Tongue Brewery is located in Chicago’s Pilsen neighborhood. At Moody Tongue, Rouben features ‘culinary brewing,’ an original approach that utilizes cooking methods alongside exceptional seasonal ingredients to produce sexy, clean, balanced beers in popular styles.

name: Mully's Brewery
description: Southern Maryland's first Production Craft Brewery! Find Patuxent Pale Ale, Marc Six Blonde, Jack Straw IPA, Carmelite Wheat and Shucker Stout at bars, liquor stores and restaurants throughout Southern MD and the Mid-Atlantic. Drink Local.

name: Napa Point Brewing
description: Napa Point Brewing opened November 2013 at 388 Devlin Road, near the Napa County Airport, with the goal of bringing “ultra-premium” beer and food to the Napa Valley  A variety of staple beers, like the India Pale Lager, American Hefeweizen, Dry Irish Stout and Amber Ale, are on tap year-round, along with a number of seasonal brews.

name: Next Door Brewing Company
description:
Next Door Brewing Company is a brewery and restaurant for our community.  We serve the best beer and food we can provide while offering a convivial environment for our customers to enjoy a great conversation over a drink and snack or meal with family, friends and neighbors — old and new.

Our beer is handcrafted in small batches and served just a few yards from where it was brewed.  Expect to find 8 to 11 choices at any time, ranging from our standards, Wilbur!, WPA and Sevex to a wide variety of seasonal, creative and collaborative brews (including a new brand of brews every 10-14 days).  And, we proudly pour a full pint.

name: Nickelpoint Brewing Co.
description: Nickelpoint Brewing Co. is a craft brewery located in the Five Points neighborhood of Raleigh, North Carolina, that will offer classic European style ales. A 20 bbl microbrewery with a tasting room is being up-fitted where customers will be able to enjoy the brewery's beers and learn about the process of brewing. Stay thirsty and stay tuned for a 2014 opening!

name: Oblivion Brewing Co.
description:
Oblivion Brewing is located in Bend, OR. We are a small production brewery producing high grade ale's. Golden, Pale, IPA, Porter, Stout, and seasonals!
At first we will be on draft only at local establishments and cans to follow!

name: Ocelot Brewing Company
description:
Craft beer is a passion, an obsession and a journey. This journey has opened our eyes (and taste buds) to some of the finest examples of beer this planet has to offer. Our tastes and expectations have forever changed, and so have our methods of enjoyment. From beer trades, to home brewing, to attending release parties and festivals one thing became clear… We rarely drink the same beer over and over again, and we love to share.

Our IPAs will be constantly revolving depending on inspiration, hop variety, availability, and season. We will make everything from low gravity Sessions, to Regulars, Doubles, Triples and even a San Diego Pale Ale or two. We will make sure these styles are released, distributed, and tapped… FRESH!

We like big beers and we cannot lie! From the biggest Russian Imperial Stouts aged in spirit barrels to malty Double Reds, Smooth Porters, and velvety Wee Heavies, we just can’t get enough of these complex beauties. Thick mouthfeel, high gravity, and rich flavors suitable for aging to be shared with family and friends. Crack one open to celebrate a special occasion, or just because its a Tuesday.

Mouth puckering sour ales is another style which we adore. One which we hoard, savor, and curse for not being more readily available. Using wine barrels from local Virginia Wineries we will age some carefully crafted super tart ales, blending them when needed and using fruits for character. Once the bugs catch up to our pipeline, expect a new sour to be released every month.

At Ocelot, we love two things… Beer and Music!

We believe in inspiration. It can come in many forms and varies from person to person. For us, music has always been our inspiration. Music has been the soundtrack to our lives and has in one way or another crafted every decision we’ve made. We aim to create and dedicate our beers to the music that has inspired our journey through life.

Ocelot Brewing Company is a reflection of us, our styles, and our habits. From chasing freshies to cellaring whales and everything in between. We will craft many different beers in small batches. We brew beer we want to drink when we want to drink it. Come by and visit, listen to some tunes, grab a pint, fill a growler, and join us on this adventure.

name: Odd13 Brewing
description: Odd13 is a brewery located at 301 East Simpson Street in old-town Lafayette, Colorado. Our focus is flavorful American-style hoppy beers, Belgian styles, and sour beers.

name: Old 690 Brewing Company
description:
Old 690 Brewing Company is one of the first farm breweries to open in the state of Virginia. Our mission is to brew and serve a unique yet balanced variety of fresh craft beers including several seasonal ales that utilize crops grown on the 10 acre property. Come out to beautiful Loudoun County to see our hops and enjoy our unique tasting room Fridays, Saturdays, and Sundays where we serve tasting flights, pints and growlers to go. We have food trucks all weekend, but feel free to bring your own food. We are also family, kid and dog friendly. We also make and serve our own root beer!

If you are interested in hosting a special, private or corporate event please contact events@old690.com. Special event hours are available 7 days a week pending availability.

Looking forward to seeing you soon at Old 690!!

name: Ollermann Brewing Co.
description: Ollermann Brewing Co is currently in the planning phase and hopes to become partners with a brewery or restaurant, with the long term goal of opening an independent brewpub. We currently do a monthly beer tasting night at the owner/brewer's house in the Denbigh area of Newport News, VA. If you'd like to become a part of these events, please send me a message. Thanks! - Aaron

name: One Love Brewery
description:
One Love Brewery and The 7th Settlement Brewing Company are proud to announce its plans to open a co-operative brewpub in Dover, New Hampshire. One Love Brewery has partnered up with The 7th Settlement Brewing Company to build and share a custom made 7-barrel brewery premise, located downtown Dover at 47 Washington Street. By forming this alliance, two very different brewers will be able to share the same brewing premises, equipment, overhead expenses and even marketing tools such as pint glasses and coasters.

Veteran brewer Michael Snyder and partner Jennifer Riley, plan on having rotating styles of beers. Because of limited fermentation space at start up, both breweries will focus on ale style beers. Ales take about 3 weeks to produce, where as a lager can takes twice as long.

“One Love means different things to different people.” Says Michael.
“For us, it’s about the love of being connected with the outdoors and the positive experiences it provides for us. We are firm believers in creating our own life experience; we go after it, one day at a time. We try to keep everything local when every possible or feasible. We are in a very special, beautiful place, and we want to enjoy everything from the shore of the Atlantic to the summits of the Presidential Range. I have been brewing professionally for 17 years. It is now time to focus on making a go at our own brewery, doing what we do best, making world-class beers! We have aligned ourselves with great people at 7th Settlement Brewing Company and are excited to open with them sometime in fall of 2013.”

name: Out.Haus Ales
description:
The name came from friends in Massachusetts. Because our house was so far away from everyone we were named the Out.Haus. When I started labeling my homebrew, that was the name I decided to use.

I quit my full-time job on Friday, January 13, 2012 to focus all of my time and energy in creating a commercial brewery. After looking at various locations and out-buildings on the property I finally decided to convert part of the garage to the brewery.

On June 28 I finally got approval from the town to convert the garage. In July of 2013 I got a Certificate of Occupancy for the brewery from the town. On October 21, 2013 I got my federal approval. On November 8, I got my state approval. I have a fully licensed brewery.

name: Owl's Orchard Brewery
description: Beer-to-go in the Southeast Valley?  Yes!  Wait … based on the address, it appears to be located in a neighborhood.  Located approximately 25 minutes from Downtown Chandler, Owl’s Orchard Brewery is a normal but very friendly dude selling beer out of his garage in Queen Creek.  If you’re at all interested in how beer is made — just ask.  He’s got an easy to see setup and is more than happy to tell you about it (as time permits).

name: Ozark Beer Company
description: We strive to make great beer. Beer that speaks to the quality and character of who we are and also to the region that we represent. We are proud to be in the Ozark Mountains, with its relaxed atmosphere and eclectic population of farmers, craftsmen, and captains of industry. At Ozark Beer Company, we make beer that brings neighbors together, and that all people lucky enough to call the Ozarks home can be proud of.

name: Panimo Hiisi
description: Small brewery in central Finland, Jyväskylä.

name: Penrose Brewing Company
description:
Art, Science, and Belgian-Inspired Brewing in Geneva, IL. 

This began with a shared obsession for skillfully brewed beer, and the starved need for cultural redirection of our lifework. Blissfully content with an opportunity to help refine a discerning palate, preferably with beer in hand, a deeper passion and commitment to the cause has evolved into Penrose Brewing Company. The cultural shift already underway is a by-product of intention and specificity. You will want to be involved.

name: Peoria Artisan Brewery
description:
Starting out as a labor of love in our garage, Peoria Artisan Brewery is our dream come true. We love beers and if you do too, you've come to the right place! We brew in-house, several varieties of our own hand-crafted ales and lagers. All of our beers are special, unique recipes with variations of the standard styles.  
 
We place our emphasis on quality and freshness and our small batches ensure that what you are drinking today is fresh and unique.

name: Perth Brewery
description: All natural microbrewed gluten-reduced BEER

name: Petaluma Hills Brewing Co
description: A 10 BBL micro brewery in Petaluma, CA working feverishly to open a tasting room.

name: Pigeon Hill Brewing Company
description:
Pigeon Hill Brewing Company arises not only out of our love for crafting the highest quality beers.  

We also strive to honor two very important parts of history in Muskegon: Pigeon Hill and Muskegon Brewing Company.

name: Pixel Brewing Co
description:
A love affair with American style beers, too much home brewing experience and the need to get out of the office and start doing what we love saw Pixel Brewing Co established in May 2013.

Pixel Brewing Co is a little brewing company based in Sydney producing hand crafted beers brewed in seriously small batches using only malt, water, hops & yeast. All Pixel beers are unfiltered, un-pasteurised, bottle conditioned and full of flavour. Pixel Brewing Co is presently brewing under contract at HopDog BeerWorks until a suitable location for our own brewing facility can be found.

The name Pixel Brewing Co was born of time (mis)spent working in the IT industry by founder & brewer Kieran Allen.

name: Pokro Brewing Company, Inc.
description: Pokro Brewing Company, Inc., is a microbrewery opening in 2014 in Griffith, IN.

name: Ponysaurus Brewing
description:
Ponysaurus is a new brewery based in Durham, North Carolina, focused on perfecting balanced styles and finding ways to make beers you’ve always imagined.

Yes, our logo is a mix between a mean-looking Tyrannosaurus Rex and a stately-looking Equus Ferus Caballus. What’s better than a pony, and what’s better than a dinosaur? Both. 

We look at beer with a kind of childlike wonder. Beer is alchemy, the holiest magic. And even though we take what we do very seriously, we never want to forget how magical it is. The name constantly reminds us of that.

When you glance at our label, it looks classic and refined. Then you take a second look and you realize it's a horse with tiny T-Rex arms.

We wanted the name to have the same effect as the beer. To make you look—and taste—twice.

Also, it's pretty damn unforgettable.

Oh yeah. That guy up there grinnin' like a shot fox? That's Keil Jansen, our Brewmaster. He's alright.

name: Populuxe Brewing
description: Populuxe Brewing is a nano-brewery (1.5bbl) open in the Ballard neighborhood of Seattle.

name: Pure Order Brewing Co.
description:
Pure Order Brewing Company produces it's beer in the spirit of the ancient German "Reiheitsgebot" which required that only four ingredients (hops, malt, yeast and water) could be used in beer production. 

Combining this tradition with the Santa Barbara lifestyle has made for a truly unique and satisfying beer that has the flavors of the richest German styles but with the relaxed drinkability that Santa Barbara inspires. 

Pure Beer. Pure Local. Pure Order.

name: Quest Brewing Company
description:
Quest Brewing Company officially started becoming a reality in January 2012.  That is when Don Richardson and Andrew Watts met for the first time; each with thoughts of opening up a microbrewery in Greenville, SC.  Both had put together plans for their company vision and, as luck would have it, those plans mirrored each other!  The two joined forces and Quest Brewing Company was founded.

Once the business was formed, a brewery name was needed.  After weeks of brainstorming, the name ‘Quest’ rose to the top of our list.  We wanted a name that emulates that passionate and adventurous spirit of the Greenville community.

”People in Greenville are always on some kind of quest.  Whether it is to bike the entire Swamp Rabbit Trail or hike Table Rock, there is a very adventurous spirit here.  We wanted to embrace that.” -Quest’s Andrew Watts

Quest’s beer is meant to be premium and sought-after, much like a goal or quest.  The next time you are in Greenville, make it your quest to visit all our town has to offer.  Head to Falls Park.  Enjoy Main Street.  Most importantly, enjoy one of Quest’s hand-crafted beers!

name: Rabbit Hole Brewing
description: Rabbit Hole Brewing is a craft brewery located in Justin, Texas which strives to create and maintain local, regional, and statewide brand recognition and loyalty with an inspired beer portfolio. Our focus is on producing high quality product which includes market under-represented beer styles, and new and unique interpretations of regional favorites. We insist on the same high quality of service and delivery of our product as we maintain during its production.

name: Railroad City Brewing Company
description:
We are an artisan nanobrewery offering a selection of fine ales, each handcrafted in a small batch. Our products will rotate pretty heavily, but we will always have at least 3-4 beers available, and something for most tastes.

Upon our opening we will be only the second brewery in Blair County and the FIRST brewery in the City of Altoona since the 1970s.

Our beers will be available at finer establishments in the area and directly from our tasting room where you can sample beers, and purchase growler fills and merchandise. We will begin offering some bottled products in the fall of 2013.

name: Raquette River Brewing
description: Racquette River Brewing is 2 bbl production brewery located in Tupper Lake, NY. We brew small batch, hand crafted Adirondack Ales.

name: Realerevival Brewing
description: Bringing craft brews back to Cambridge this summer. Built on the belief that people should have a say in the beer they drink.

name: Red Leg Brewing Company
description: Red Leg Brewing Company was established to provide the highest quality craft beer to honor the Men and Women who currently and formerly served in The United States of America. Our craft beers are developed with the utmost care, using only the highest quality craft beer ingredients. The craft beers that leave our facility will have the reputation that we strive for, continuing our service by providing those who serve with a craft beer they can be proud of.

name: Regimental Brewing Company
description: We are a husband and wife superduo (emphasis on the duo, less on the super) who are building a brewery from the ground up. Stay tuned!

name: Retro Beer Company
description: We are three-retired friends who believe that giving back to others is life's greatest virtue. We were raised on these basic ideals: Love for Community, Importance of Generosity, and the Need for Sustainability. History tells us that the invention of beer inspired the idea of community. When people come together to enjoy beer, amazing things happen: Friendships are sparked, stories are shared, ideas are cultivated. Beer is simply a social vehicle for people to discuss what really matters in life. Together we can be a driving force in giving back to a cause in your community. 20% of this beverage’s proceeds go to [insert charity]. With your help we can shift the purpose behind beer to generously give back to the community

name: Rhinegeist
description:
Rhinegeist is a brewery out of Cincinnati, OH that was built within the skeleton of the old Moerlein bottling plant (built in 1895). Within these unique and historic walls, we brew 20bbl batches of beer that sings with flavor and delights us. The yin/yang of our brewing philosophy is hoppy/sessionable and we aim to brew beers where “the first sip calls for the third”.  We’re a small team with big dreams and tend to smile while we sweat. We brew those styles which are most compelling to our thirst and we certainly hope you enjoy our brews as much as we do.

Rhinegeist means “ghost of the Rhine”, and refers to our place here in the historic Brewery District in the Over the Rhine neighborhood of Cincinnati. At the turn of the century, this neighborhood was home to nearly 45,o00 inhabitants, most of them of German descent and 38 breweries. We hope to engender the spirit of camaraderie and hard work that we imagine those living and brewing in this neighborhood at that time embodied.

We self distribute our beer, which means each beer that you drink in a bar or restaurant is poured from a keg that we delivered cold in our refrigerated van (keep your eyes peeled for it around town). We like to keep beer as fresh as possible, which means that every keg we fill is immediately moved into cold storage where it sits until we load it onto our refrigerated van for delivery to the coldbox of each local account. Fresh beer is tasty beer, and that’s our favorite kind.

name: Riff Raff Brewing
description: Founded in 2013, Riff Raff Brewing Company opens in downtown Pagosa Springs, Colorado, in May 2013. The brewery—Pagosa Springs’ first downtown brewery—features artisan ales handcrafted in Riff Raff’s historic Victorian building.

name: Rupert's Brew House
description:
"Where Good Friends Meet" located in the historic Oakland Pharmacy in Kalamazoo, MI

We're a small boutique brewery featuring over 8 hand-crafted beers on tap. We're unique by offering live entertainment 6 nights a week and never a cover. BYOF (Bring Your Own Food) or order in for delivery by one of the many local food joints.

Experience the down home, relaxed atmosphere where the beer pours freely and there's never a cover. Make sure you visit Captn Stooby our mascot.

name: Rusty Beaver Brewery
description:
Well this story starts about twenty years ago when Me and the Mrs. were a just a little younger. See the city life didn’t do it, neighbor’s too close or just plain freedom of the country, Something got us seeking a different path? We moved out from the Capital city to our new Beaver dam address, 30 acres with an old barn and a pond near here is home and home is good. Wouldn’t trade it for another pond anywhere! Peaceful country living, it feeds the soul, drink some in as you spend a little time with us. 

We got busy, raised the little ones up, built a business and worked hard on the old homestead remembering to be grateful each day for the life we have carved out. What a long strange trip it has been so far! We have learned ambition and hard work get you where you want to go, it just takes some time and a lot of patience! 

Austin and I Started brewing several years ago, we loved cooking together and drinking too so it was a natural progression. Brewing and sharing with friends our fresh all grain brews became an obsession for us. Our passion is to brew great local beers by sourcing the finest quality ingredients available and creating craft recipes that highlight the best qualities of those ingredients. Please stop by our brewery to enjoy the freshest beer available. After you have tried one we hope you will agree,“You never forget your first Beaver”

name: Saint Archer Brewing Company
description: Saint Archer Brewing Company was founded on a unique strain of creative talent: World-class brewers. Artists and musicians. Surfers, skateboarders, and snowboarders…. All coming together with passion and commitment to express our collective true love — handcrafted beer. Saint Archer's been a long time in the tank and we hope you taste our appreciation and gratitude in every sip.

name: Saltwater Brewery
description: Saltwater Brewery is more than a craft brewing company, it's a way of life. We are a team of native Floridians whose roots and values spur from a lifestyle that revolves around the Ocean.  This attachment and desire to maintain the world's greatest wonder, is what drove us to pursue a way to give back while continuing to refine our taste for our unique quality craft beers.

name: Schilling Beer Co.
description:
Schilling Beer Co.'s lagers and ales are inspired by centuries-old Belgian, Czech and German beer-making, yet are defined by their modern relevance and creativity. Our gourmet wood-fired pizzas are topped with the freshest ingredients and make the ideal accompaniment to our beer.

Schilling is proud to brew world-class lagers and ales for our community and friends. Come visit our craft brewery and riverside taproom (a restored 18th century grist mill) in the pristine White Mountains in Littleton, NH (just off Main St).

name: Scratch Brewing Company
description: Scratch Brewing Company is a farmhouse brewery located 5 miles from the Shawnee National Forest in Ava, Illinois. The brewery focuses on farmhouse beers and other styles enhanced by the innovative addition of local ingredients, including: nettle, elderberry, ginger, dandelion, maple sap, hickory nuts, wild carrot seed, cedar, and others.

name: Shannon Brewing Company
description: At Shannon Brewing, we are passionate about great beer—all natural, beautiful, wholesome, easy-drinking beer! Shannon Brewing Company’s great beer comes from a profound commitment to our “old-world” brewing process, the best natural ingredients available and a VERY patient aging process.

name: Sideswipe Brewing
description: Founded in 2013, Sideswipe Brewing is a nanobrewery slated to open later this year in Columbus, Ohio. Our initial product line of 22-ounce bottles will include an IPA, saison and smoked stout. Follow us on Facebook for updates as we prepare to open.

name: Slate Creek Brewing Co.
description: Slate Creek is a little know tributary to the St. Joe River deep in the mountains of North Idaho. Hidden by steep rugged canyon walls, Slate Creek has long been a secret spot for anglers and whitewater explorers. Slate Creek Brewing Co., like the mountain stream it is named after, is a secret spot for craft beer explorers, serving up adventurous, rugged and beautifully hand crafted ales for those daring enough to explore the un-trampled path. Discover the secret spot in your own backyard.

name: Small Batch Beer Company
description: Small Batch Beer Co. is a brewery and handcrafted cocktail bar in downtown Winston-Salem, NC. Soon to be located in the Kopper Kitchen building, our goal is to give every patron a unique taste and experience each time they come through the door.

We've had a vision of a business that could bring the very best in these things together, and now our vision has become reality. Smoke 'n Hops will brew our own beer on site, smoke our own Texas-style BBQ, and bring in prominent musicians as well as local acts with ties to the community. It is very important to us to tie these things in with a fun, family-oriented environment. Therefore we have installed a playground so the younger ones are having fun while the older ones are at play.

name: South Bend Brew Werks
description: Our mission is to “Build a stronger community, one brew at a time.” That means the community of brewers, of craft beer drinkers, of foodies, of local food producers, and of course, South Bend. We plan to celebrate and support South Bend, honoring its long heritage of brewing and food producing by making great beer and backing it up with locally sourced food. Sustainability is hard at work in South Bend and it’s a core tenet for us. Adaptive reuse is a philosophy we’re embracing fully and you’ll see it throughout our pub. We are fiercely proud of this city and it is an honor to have it as part of our name and be part of its renaissance.

name: Stoup Brewing
description:
Stoup Brewing – The Art and Science of Beer

At Stoup, our craftsmanship is a testament to our commitment to the art and the science of beer. As scientists, we hold the microorganisms and chemical processes that create beer in the highest esteem. As artists, we revel in a good pour. The dual disposition honors traditional styles perfected by earlier brew-masters as well as elevates craft brewing by continually seeking a better pint.

Our brewery will communicate a respect for both the art and science of beer by cultivating a warm and communal environment – a place for friends to gather and for enthusiasts to chat with the brewers over a well-fashioned, delicious beer.

name: T.W. Pitchers'
description:
When Wilson Barr and Tommy Hester met at Williams College in 2007, both were pitchers on the Varsity baseball team. However, they quickly realized their love of baseball was more than equaled by their love of a good drink. Despite the desolate landscape of college get-togethers where there was a strong emphasis on a drink's quantity over quality, Wilson and Tommy were able to find a shared interest in the craft beer industry. When they started an alcoholic beverage company, their adventurous attitudes translated into a desire to create a product that was truly new and exciting. The result was T.W. Pitchers’ Snake Bite®.

While in college, Wilson lived in Europe and discovered that generations of British pub-goers have enjoyed blending lager and hard apple cider. He was astonished to learn the popular concoction had only sparingly made its way across the pond to the United States. Ready to undo this injustice, he returned from his trip and founded W.G. Barr Beverage Company. Tommy was brought on board, and the dynamic duo got to work bringing Snake Bite – a bottled blend of lager and cider - to the thirsty people of America. T.W. Pitchers’, which stands for "Two Williams Pitchers’," or "Tommy and Wilson, Pitchers," was immediately settled on as the brand name.

After months of hard work and many late nights spent taste testing, Wilson and Tommy launched T.W. Pitchers’ Snake Bite in San Francisco. Armed with their Airstream office, a little bit of know-how, and a whole lot of gumption, Wilson and Tommy are committed to quenching your thirst, one bottle of Snake Bite at a time. Cheers!

name: Tahoe Mountain Brewing Company
description: We are a craft brewery in Truckee and Tahoe City, CA. Our brew pub is in downtown Tahoe City, right on the shore of Lake Tahoe across from Commons Beach. In addition to our specialty ales and lagers, we have a full bar and full menu featuring smokehouse BBQ meats, wood-fired flat bread pizzas, fish, pasta, gourmet and traditional pub faire as well as innovative dishes such as our Cajun Seared Ahi Nachos. We have vegan/vegetarian options, the pub is family friendly and has a kids menu. The pub also has outdoor patio seating, a full bar and a great rustic interior set among our collection of french oak barrels with aging beer.

name: Temperance Beer Company
description:
It’s taken almost one hundred years, but Evanston can once again call itself home to a Temperance movement. But this time there’s beer. In fact, this one is all about the beer. Aside from that tiny detail, Temperance has always been about making life better in ways big and small. We think that’s a worthy goal, and one that only comes about by being open to the possibilities. It’s something we think about with the beers we brew and the things we do. (And when you join us, you will too.)
Welcome to a new Temperance movement.

name: Texas Beer Refinery

Our plans are to open a BrewPub in Kemah, TX where our beers will be brewed onsite. We look forward to serving you soon. Cheers!

name: The Wild Rover Brewery
description:
In an attempt to bring the character and feel of an old English pub to Tampa, father and son team Derek and Ricky Wells founded The Wild Rover Pub & Brewery as a local place for people to come and socialize, while enjoying a finely crafted local beer. It is a place were everyone is welcome; where a communal bond is formed. 
The in-house 4 barrel brewing system will service as a means of providing quality beer for you and your neighbor. In the last decade, the demand for better beer has been on the rise, and the customer is becoming more discerning in their tastes. Our aim is to provide a local craft brew that we, as a community, can be proud of, and to showcase some of the ever increasing number of great Tampa area breweries!

name: Timeless Pints Brewing Company
description:
Lakewood's first microbrewery! 

On Father's Day, several years ago, my son and I purchased a home brewing kit for my husband. As an Engineer and a lover of craft beer, he was excited to experiment with his own concoctions. Since his first trial run, he's produced multiple variety of stouts, ales, lagers and IPA's as well as very happy friends, family and neighbors. His love for the unique keeps him constantly in search of "new and different" ingredients and the hope of a perfect combination.

One hot July evening, some friends disclosed they were embarking on a new restaurant idea. They asked Chris (my husband) if he would brew the beer specifically for their new endeavor. The ABC frowns on beer sold without the proper licensing and selling from the kitchen counter is not a viable option. Thus a new venture began.

What was once a dream is now a reality and we can now bring our own craft beer to our local Lakewood/Long Beach community. You'll find us just behind the Long Beach Airport.

name: Top Shelf Brewery
description: Top Shelf Brewery is the newest brewery to hit Connecticut. It was created to provide top of the line locally hand crafted brews. After we finish all of the necessary paperwork with the government we will bring you the highest quality beer the area has to offer. Our 3 flagship beers will be available in stores around state as well as on draft in all of your favorite bars and restaurants. Our taproom will consist of 8+ taps where you will not only be able to drink our 3 flagship beers but many others that are only available in our taproom. All of these hand crafted beers will be available to go from our taproom via 22oz bombers.

name: Toxic Brew Company
description: The Toxic Brew Company is a brewpub in downtown Dayton’s Oregon District. We brew and serve our beer on premise at 431 E. Fifth St. Dayton, OH, in the middle of the Oregon District. The TBC (Toxic Brew Company) is the first brewery in over 50 years to produce beer in downtown Dayton, OH.

name: Trailhead Brewery
description:
Trailhead Brewery is a 1-2 barrel nanobrewery where people can come enjoy locally made microbrews, chat directly with the brewmaster, and become involved in the overall experience of an ever evolving variety of craft brewed beers.

The brewmaster at Trailhead Brewery, Eli Smart, imparts different elements of his cultural experiences in this newly opened Akron, Ohio nanobrewery. Through growing up in Hawaii and living in Colorado, this Ohio State University graduate creates beautiful tasting beers in a relaxed atmosphere in the tradition of Colorado's "taste and tour" microbrew scene.

Trailhead Brewery is aptly named for being located on the Ohio & Erie Canal Towpath and Sand Run trails. The style and taste of beers also invites guests to be taken away to other famous trails around the United States and are named to invoke those images. This is Akron's place to go for exciting new beer tasting, for trailblazers, beer lovers, and novices alike.

name: Trillium Brewing
description: We are a family owned and operated brewery in the Fort Point Channel neighborhood of Boston, Massachusetts. We created Trillium to realize our dream of bringing creative and flavorful beers to you. These beers are what we envision might have been made today, if a centuries old beer culture had naturally evolved in New England.  To achieve this vision, we stand our craft beers on the shoulders of native ingredients and artisan practices, balancing them with modern-day expertise.

name: Two Henrys Brewing Company
description:
The Two Henrys Brewing Company brews modern and traditional hand-crafted beer styles in small batches in Plant City, FL. Because local and small is just better.

With our beers we celebrate Florida’s short history and people that made our great state possible. We strive to make great beers and sneak in a Florida history lesson whether you want it or not. 

Our beers can be found at our tasting room starting on or about October 1, 2013 and select bars and restaurants in the Tampa Bay area. In the meantime, read about our coming beers and namesakes ,the Two Henrys, below…or don’t.

name: Uncle Bear's Brewhouse Grill
description:
“COME, SIT AND STAY”

Who Was Uncle Bear, You Ask?

 

    Well he was a fun loving good fella, of the Labrador mix named “Bear”. In the good ole’ days as a young pup, he could be found cruising the college campus at Texas Tech University in Lubbock, body surfin’ at Doggie Beach in Ocean Beach (San Diego), skiing down the snow capped mountains in Ruidoso, New Mexico, relaxing in the Hot Springs of Arkansas and finally making his home in the Valley of the Sun. Since Bear was an active dog and on the go, he wanted to create a place where he and his friends could “Come, Sit And Stay”.

    Well Uncle Bears’ Brewhouse Grill is that place. Born out of Bear’s  love for craft beer and excellent food, we have created an upbeat, fun atmosphere where friends, family and co-workers can come to enjoy a variety of delicious menu selections & NOW our own locally brewed craft beer. The Uncle Bear’s Brewhouse opened in 2013, as well as the 4 Grill and Bar locations were re-branded to the Grill and Tap concept that same year.

On the menu, whenever you see Bear’s paw print  you can be assured the item is a long-term house favorite or a new favorite we are sure Bear would have loved. Try any one of the items from the “Famous” Sliders, Backyard Burgers and Birds, Big Plates and Serious Sizzles, Gourmet Pizza, Bear “Bites” or Wing selections and you are in for a true treat.    

The unique motif has been designed to resemble all of the places Bear or your family dog would hang out such as the garage, backyard or home.

 In addition to the excellent food menu, we feature fantastic house drinks and NOW a wonderful selection of craft beers brewed on site in our state of the art display brewery. Be sure to try a Flight Bone (5-4oz. tasters) or a Growler (64oz. take-home jug) or a pint of our craft beer. With all the goodies mentioned above and numerous sporting events on a slew of TV’s, we promise you will be treated to a “Doggone Good” experience compliments of our attentive, knowledgeable and enthusiastic team..

name: Urban Growler Brewing Company
description: Urban Growler Brewing Company (UGBC) is a packaging microbrewery located in St. Paul, Minnesota and opening in 2013. We'll sell our own artisanal beer and food onsite in the brewery taproom and kegs offsite to Metro area retailers.

name: Urban Legend Brewing Company
description:
Urban Legend Brewing Company makes unique beers the traditional way. Beer is our passion. We believe that our beer can make the world and our local community a better place! We use only the highest quality ingredients and make small batches to ensure that we supply our community with the purest, freshest, highest quality beer possible. Our goal is to support local businesses and American manufacturing wherever possible. We are committed to recycling, reusing, and reducing our carbon footprint while at the same time making unique beers for discerning beer lovers and craft beer newbies. We will think local and will contribute to the local economy. 
The beer we produce will be available in our brewery and at local bars, restaurants and liquor stores. Fresh beer always tastes the best! Pints in the taproom, growlers to go, and small scale, local distribution is our way of ensuring our product is in its prime when it gets to your glass. We have a number of staple beers on draught plus we will be providing a rotating line of seasonal and specialty brews. We love to rediscover ancient beer recipes as well as spend a lot of time developing a unique styles.
As we say.....Great Beer, Born Here.

name: Van Moll
description: It's time. The very first brewpub in Eindhoven is a fact. We're called Van Moll. Or you can call us and Jaap and Erwin, because we're called that too. Two men with a passion for beer in the heart of the city. And if you find a brewpub unnecessarily fashionable term - as we do - then just call it a tasting room. Or a pub, because we are also that.

name: Verboten Brewing
description:
Verboten is an award-winning artisan craft brewery located in Loveland, Colorado. Our beers are an exciting mix between traditional styles and experimental brews, lovingly fretted over by our brewer, Josh Grenz. Verboten opened in 2013 and in 2014 took home two World Beer Cup medals. 

Carefully handcrafted from conception until our brew fills your glass, Verboten provides an endlessly exciting journey for craft beer lovers. Our tagline is "Beer for All," and we believe there is a perfect beer out there for everyone.

name: Veterans United Craft Brewery
description:
Veterans United Craft Brewery is dedicated to satiating healthy appetites with flavorful beer through the use of fresh, quality ingredients and hope to expand the definition of what beer can be through our hard work and innovation. We also value ideas and technologies that reinforce our social and environmental responsibility to our local community. 

Join us Wednesday through Saturday in our brand new taproom to experience our beer right from the source. We'll be serving our flagship Raging Blonde Ale and Hopbanshee IPA, as well as taproom-exclusive brews and some great guest beers. 

Take home a 32 or 128 oz. Growler or just enjoy a few pints. 

Enjoy a tour of the brewery production area on Saturdays, from 1:30pm–4:30pm (one every hour; cost is $5 and includes a guided tour, tasting glass, and sample pours of our beers on tap).

Keep an eye on our Facebook and Twitter feeds or sign up for our e-newsletter to see when talented local musicians and delicious food trucks will be around. 

Veterans United Craft Brewery is committed to making a positive contribution to Jacksonville and beyond, and we look forward to sharing a pint with you!

name: Village Idiot Brewing Company
description:
Our brewery is a 1.5 BBL (46.5 gallons) artisanal, small-batch, neighborhood business brewing quality beer for good people who appreciate good beer.  We offer samples, pints, and growler fills. Our unique tasting room is situated at the location of the former Bridgetown Pub, just a short drive from NJ Turnpike Exit 5 or the Mt. Holly exit off 295. We combine fresh ingredients with beer education and a brewery tour to refresh, enlighten and inform.

Our limited brewery license prevents us from serving food, but  we encourage our customers to carry-in or order delivery from one of the many restaurants in downtown Mt. Holly within walking distance.

Village Idiot Brewing Company is a very unique concept that we have seen blend in and work successfully in other Main Street settings across the country.  Our small size allows us to be nimble and offer tap selections that change frequently.

name: Vindication Brewing Co.
description: A Brewery Founded on the Principles of Craft and Precision, with an Obsession for the Details of Quality, and a Belief in the Power of Beer to Bring People Together.

name: Wakarusa Brewery
description: The sum of experiences between John and James means a variety of beers including ales, pale ales, stouts and IPAS. Sometimes, a dry hard cider will make an appearance. The Wakarusa Brewery will offer a few flagship beers with a mix of crafted seasonals.

name: White Lion Brewing Company
description: White Lion symbolizes grace with limitless boundaries, the consumer being part of something bigger than them; positioned between lessons taught and possibilities inspired by their energy and spirit.

name: White Pony microbrewery
description: White Pony is a micro-brewery located in Padova (Italy). We brew our beers in Belgium and Italy. All our Beers are handmade, unfiltered & unpasteurized

name: Wicks Brewing Co
description:
Wicks Brewing Company is not your typical Brewery. Besides brewing up barrels of delicious Craft Beer and having a full tasting bar, we offer our guests other amenities as well. 

If you are an avid homebrewer or wish to jump into the hobby of homebrewing, we carry everything you need to brew your own Craft Beer or Soft Drinks at home...yes, Soft Drinks as well. There’s no tastier Root Beer than one you made yourself. 

If you would like to brew your own Craft Beer or Soft Drinks, but don’t have the room to do it at home or just plain don’t want to own the tools & equipment, we have that covered as well. We have six separate stations where you can brew your own Craft Beer or Soft Drink right here at Wicks Brewing. This system is known as a Brew on Premise (or BOP). All you need to do is choose one of our recipes you would like to try and we will walk you thru the whole brewing process using one of our BOP stations and the ingredients from our stock.

Hungry?...Well, we can take care of that as well. We have an onsite, fully stocked kitchen. The delicious choices on our menu range from appetizers to salads to hardy meals and even desserts. 

Make Wicks Brewing your next destination for fun & relaxation, you’ll be happy you did.

name: Wild Cider
description: The World's Best Cider. Produced and packaged in the shadow of the Great Colorado Rockies. Indulge your senses with all our different ciders. Get Wild!

name: Wisconsin Brewing Company
description:
he Wisconsin Brewing Company brewhouse we're building is an exciting mixture of old world, artisan craftsmanship and state-of-the art brewing technology. Built in Hudson, WI, our German-engineered Huppmann Brewhouse will be capable of producing in excess of 100,000 barrels of Wisconsin craft beer annually. The tradition and history behind Huppmann goes back more than 130 years—perfect for true craft beer.

In addition to a great brew house, we have a one-barrel Pilot Brewery on site to develop many of our beers, as well as an event center for parties and other events. The event center also has a gift shop, where you can buy Wisconsin Brewing Company apparel, gift items, and of course, beer.

Put all these pieces together next to a scenic pond with access to bike trails and plenty of beautiful landscape and you can have one heck of a brewery experience.

name: Wiseacre Brewing Co.
description: WISEACRE is a craft brewery committed to top quality, uniquely flavorful beer that appeals to passionate & progressive people through education & good times.  The brewery name comes from a term of endearment/scolding their grandmother used on the young troublemakers.  Brothers Davin & Kellan Bartosch dreamed up WISEACRE many moons ago & have been on an extensive quest procuring top-notch experience from around the globe to deliver the crunkest brewery possible in their groovy hometown of Memphis, TN.

name: Working Man Brewing Company
description:
Working Man Brewing is Livermore’s newest brewery, located at 5542 Brisa Street, just off of Vasco Road.  Getting the brewery up and running has been a labor of love for the owners, taking the better part of 18 months to turn the space into a full production brewery.  We are excited to finally bring our love of beer and commitment to quality to Livermore, the Tri-Valley, and beyond.

Our story is one of two independent breweries, Mt. Diablo Brewing and Working Man Brewing Company, coming together to work on one common goal.  Both companies were founded by award-winning home brewers who have a passion to bring high quality, well crafted beer that is fresh and local.  A chance meeting brought these working men together; a shared vision now combines forces under one name, Working Man Brewing Company.

The company’s brewers have each have spent years working to perfect great beer recipes.  Beer geeks at heart, both will tinker and tweak the ingredients until the product is just right.  The main goal always being to make a beer they could be proud to share and proud to drink. We never let a beer go out the door that we don’t believe in.

name: Zephyr Brewing Co
description: Brewery in development.  From an article on denveroffthewagon.com, "Zephyr comes from the passenger train that ran out of Denver for 35 years. Our location in RiNo is very near the train tracks that still exist and Union Station. The Denver Zephyr minor league baseball team was also named after the train and played in Denver under that name for eight years.
